name: Yenni Capital
description: Founded in 1991, Yenni Capital is a private equity investment firm that focuses on the lower middle market. The firm takes control equity positions in growth-oriented and profitable United States based companies in the manufacturing and service sectors. It is based in New York, New York and uses conservative leverage in its acquisitions and aims to make significant cash distributions from its portfolio companies annually.

It was founded in 2010 and is based in Dana Point, California.
